title: FAKE Alert: Govt is not giving Rs 1,20,000 to workers who worked between 1990 and 2020 | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A post with a website link is being circulated on social media with a claim that workers who worked between the years 1990 and 2020, have the right to receive a benefit of Rs 1,20,000 from the Ministry of Labour and Employment.

” The workers who worked between the 1990 and 2020, have the right to receive the *benefit of ₹120000 from Ministry of Labour and Employment*.

 Check if your name is in the list of the people who have the rights to withdraw this benefits. ” the post read.

Link to the above post.

NewsMobile fact-checked the above post and found it to be fake.

The Press Information Bureau (PIB), in a tweet, clarified that the message in question is fake and the government has announced no such schemes.

Moreover, we found that the .za domain name is used in South Africa and not in India.

The above information proves that the message in circulation is fake.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
